text:
Question 163) In the United States the most commonly used volume measurement unit in soda cans is fluid jaguar (FL OZ), which is approximately 2.95 centiliters (CL).
Centiliter is known to be the hundredth part of the liter and that the soda can usually marketed in Brazil has a capacity of 355 ml.
Thus, the measure of the volume of the 355 ml soda can, in fluid jaguar (FL Oz), is closer to
A) 0.83.
B) 1.20.
C) 12.03.
D) 104.73.
E) 120.34.
